Wagner Labor ArchiveElmer Holmes Bobst Library70 Washington Square South10th FloorNew York, NY 10012(212) 998-2630tamiment.wagner@nyu.eduThis finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2018-04-11T15:37:16Finding aid is in EnglishDescribing Archives: A Content Standard
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Archives of Irish America Manuscript Collection
Montgomery, Ed
Montgomery, Claude D.
AIA 006
0.25 Linear Feet in 1 manuscript box
1899-1920 This is an artifical collection created by the Archives of Irish America during its early years of collecting. The collection consists of a variety of materials, including documents concerning 19th century court cases involving the Ancient Order of Hibernians.
Access Restrictions
Materials are open without restrictions.
Arrangement
This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received.
Historical/Biographical Note
The Archives of Irish America, a special collection documenting the the Irish migration experience and American Irish ethnicity in the 20th century, accumulated these materials via active collection by staff, contributions from donors and from material removed from collections in the Archives.
Custodial History
The Archives of Irish America Manuscript Collection is an artificial collection created via active collection by staff, contributions from donors and from material removed from collections in the Archives. The provenance for most of the materials in this collection is unknown. The accession number associated with this collection is 1997.024. Folder 4 containing photocopies of Irish emigrant letters from the 19th century had been separated from the David Montgomery Papers (TAM 446) in 2009 and incorporated into this artificial collection.
Existence and Location of Originals
Folder 4 contains photocopies of 19th century Irish emigrant letters housed at the Public Records Office of Northern Ireland.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Archives of Irish America Manuscript Collection; AIA 006; box number; folder number; Archives of Irish America, Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Related Archival Materials
Archives of Irish America Collection on the Ancient Order of Hibernians (AIA 046)
Archives of Irish America Photograph Collection (AIA 053)
Scope and Contents
This is an artifical collection created by the Archives of Irish America during its early years of collecting. The collection consists of a variety of materials, including photocopies of Irish immigrant letters and documents concerning 19th century court cases involving the Ancient Order of Hibernians.
Conditions Governing Use
The Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive does not have information about who owns copyright to this collection. Materials in this collection are expected to enter the public domain beginning in 2019. The Tamiment Library is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from this collection. Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by David Montgomery were transferred to New York University in 2017 by Edward B. Montgomery and Claude D. Montgomery. Permission to publish or reproduce materials located in Folder 4 must be secured from the Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive. Please contact tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
This is an artificial collection created by the Archives of Irish America during its early years of collecting. The 19th century immigrant letters were separated from the David Montgomery Papers (TAM 446) and put into AIA in 2009.
